sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  import { Playground, PropsTable } from 'docz';
import { Button } from '../';

export default ({components, ...props}) => <MDXTag name="wrapper"  components={components}>
<MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"button"}}>{`Button`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"properties"}}>{`Properties`}</MDXTag>
<PropsTable of={Button} />
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"sizes"}}>{`Sizes`}</MDXTag>

__code={`<Button color="warning">Warning</Button>
<Button color="secondary">Secondary</Button>
<Button color="error">Error</Button>
<Button color="primary">Primary</Button>
<Button color="success">Success</Button>
<Button color="black">Black</Button>
<Button color="white">White</Button>`} __scope={{props,Button}}>
    <Button color="warning">
        Warning
    </Button>
    <Button color="secondary">
        Secondary
    </Button>
    <Button color="error">
        Error
    </Button>
    <Button color="primary">
        Primary
    </Button>
    <Button color="success">
        Success
    </Button>
    <Button color="black">
        Black
    </Button>
    <Button color="white">
        White
    </Button>
</Playground>
